pre_caption: The video opens with a wide shot where an animated character is positioned in the middle ground, slightly left of center, in an acrobatic pose over the trunk of a green car. If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

In addition, the human-written captions below already describe the subjects (if any) and the scenery in this video but do not capture their spatial composition and movements. Use these captions as a reference, but do not rely on them completely. Your goal is to fully capture the spatial framing and movements in this video. A figure in a black coat moves acrobatically over the green car and then runs along the sidewalk.**
